name: server-side-render-only
description: Module Federation Server Side Rendering, no client side implementation

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run buildHost" "npm run startHost" "npm run buildRemote" "npm run startRemote"
scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3000/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/tests/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
